prod_desc: Climb in the cockpit and set a new speed record!
prod_long_desc:
Take the wheel and wait for the green light with the powerful LEGO® City Speed Record Car! This fast vehicle construction toy features an opening cockpit, iconic flame elements and a large rear wing. Includes a minifigure.
Includes a driver minifigure.
Features a streamlined car with opening cockpit, flame elements and large rear wing.
Close the cockpit to make sure there’s no air drag while you race.
This construction toy is suitable for ages 5-12.
Speed Record Car measures over 2” high, 8” long and 3” wide.
As seen in the LEGO® City Vehicles TV commercial.
